General.Name: Tainet Communication System
General.Description: Tainet Communication System Corp. provides carrier class access equipment to telecom carriers, service operators, and business users worldwide. The company offers Ethernet access devices, VoIP gateway products, xDSL and analog modems, PON, optical transceivers, and interface converters. It also provides copper over fiber connectivity, VoIP gateway communication, xDSL Ethernet, and TDM over IP communication solutions. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.108, Ruiguang Road, Taipei City, Taiwan, 114

1.Name: Mr. Zhong Kang Huang
